name: DefiniteBlue Solutions
tag_list: marketing, marketers, advertising, internet-marketing, digital-marketing, seo, ppc, web-design, web-designers, web-development, web-developers, crm, loyalty
overview:
DefiniteBlue Solutions provides digital marketing services to advance businesses into the Internet age of online advertising and commerce. Using a 3-step system called “Plan, Produce, and Promote” they help organize Internet and digital marketing campaigns, implement them by creating a professional website and then perform the marketing necessary to bring in traffic and successfully turn that traffic into loyal customers.

Each of the services provided by DefiniteBlue Solutions is catagorized under one of the “Plan, Produce, Promote” phases. Below is a list of the services provided by DefiniteBlue Solutions:

Plan

  • Internet marketing plan
  • Web design plan

Produce

  • Logo design
  • Web design
  • Web hosting
  • CMS software
  • Productivity software
  • CRM software
  • Ecommerce software
  • Community software

Promote

  • SEO marketing
  • Search engine marketing
  • Online media marketing
  • Social media marketing
  • Affiliate marketing
  • Loyalty & rewards marketing
  • Email marketing
  • Local directory marketing
  • Cragslist marketing
  • Site clone marketing
  • Drip & newsletter marketing

To begin helping businesses identify how these services can help them, a free consultation is setup immediately. From there, a custom-tailored package and quote is created around their needs and budget.

offices.address1: 12835 E Arapahoe Rd, Tower I - Ste 700
